DOC.brief_summary: The aim present study verify glycated hemoglobin ( HbA1c ) HOMA behavior pregnant woman gestational diabetes chronic hypertension aerobic train cycle-ergometer . The sample compose 64 pregnant sedentary woman , 20 week ' pregnant . Two experimental group ( gestational diabetes chronic hypertension , n = 16 ) perform low-intensity aerobic training cycle-ergometer , three times/week , 45 minute session . Two control group ( gestational diabetes chronic hypertension , n = 16 ) perform unique session/week relaxation stretch . Outcomes : first ventilatory threshold , HbA1c , HOMA , type delivery , weight height newborn .
DOC.brief_title: Aerobic Training Pregnant Women With Gestational Diabetes Chronic Hypertension
DOC.detailed_description: The statistical analysis consist : - descriptive statistic ; - Levene 's test - Shapiro Wilk 's normality test - Parametric non-parametric test - a=0.05 - SPSS 17.0
DOC.criteria: age > 20 year ; gestational age 20 27 week ( date last period confirm ultrasound ) ; Only one foetus womb ; Without orthopedic limitation ; Nonsmoker ; Medical clearance exercise Preeclampsia ; fetal malformation ; Intrauterine fetal death
